se.lu.nateko.edca

Class MapViewer

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • se.lu.nateko.edca.MapViewer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.android.gms.common.GooglePlayServicesClient.ConnectionCallbacks, com.google.android.gms.common.GooglePlayServicesClient.OnConnectionFailedListener, com.google.android.gms.location.LocationListener, com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap.OnCameraChangeListener, com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap.OnMapLongClickListener, com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap.OnMarkerClickListener

    public class MapViewer
extends Activity
implements com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap.OnCameraChangeListener, com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap.OnMapLongClickListener, com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap.OnMarkerClickListener, com.google.android.gms.common.GooglePlayServicesClient.ConnectionCallbacks, com.google.android.gms.common.GooglePlayServicesClient.OnConnectionFailedListener, com.google.android.gms.location.LocationListener
    COPYRIGHT*********************************** This file is part of the Emergency Data Collector for Android™ (EDCA). * Copyright © 2013 Mattias Spångmyr. * * LICENSE************************************ EDCA is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under * the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free * Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or (at your * option) any later version. * * EDCA is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY * WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or * FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License * for more details. * * You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License along * with EDCA. If not, see "http://www.gnu.org/licenses/". * * The latest source for this software can be accessed at * "github.org/mattiassp/edca". * * EDCA also utilizes the JTS Topology Suite, Version 1.8 by Vivid * Solutions Inc. It is released under the Lesser General Public License * ("http://www.gnu.org/licenses/") and its source can be accessed at the * JTS Topology Suite website ("http://www.vividsolutions.com/jts"). * * Android™ is a trademark of Google Inc. The Android source is released * under the Apache License 2.0 * ("http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0") and can be accessed at * "http://source.android.com/". * * For other enquiries, e-mail to: edca.contact@gmail.com * * Activity which displays a Google Maps background with a map image made * from WMS (GetMap) requests overlayed. It lets the user navigate * (panning, zooming etc.) as well as add features with attribute data to * the active local layer. * *
    Version:
    0.51, 2013-07-24 * *
    Author:
    Mattias Spångmyr *

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static com.google.android.gms.location.LocationRequest LOCATION_REQUEST
      Constant defining the Location Updates settings.
      private static int LOCATION_REQUEST_TIMEOUT
      The time to wait (ms) before stopping location updates if the user has not accepted any location.
      private static int LOCATIONCLIENT_CONNECTION_REQUEST
      Constant identifying the resolution request of a failed LocationClient connection attempt.
      private ImageView mGetMapView
      The ImageView showing the image response of a GetMap request.
      private java.util.Timer mLocateTimer
      A timer wating a specified time, after starting to request Location Updates, to stop the updates.
      private Location mLocation
      The user's last known location.
      private com.google.android.gms.location.LocationClient mLocationClient
      The LocationCLient used to control and receive Location Updates.
      private TextView mLocationMessageView
      The TextView which displays location updates and responds to user clicks, letting the user save the location.
      private com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap mMap
      The Map object, providing access to the Google Maps API.
      private com.google.android.gms.maps.MapView mMapView
      The MapView used to display the Google Maps background.
      private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Long> mMarkers
      A list of the Markers added to the map, sorted by the geomId of the geometry they represent.
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Long> mSelected
      A list of the ID:s of all OverlayItems that have been selected (to combine into a line/polygon feature).
      private com.google.android.gms.maps.model.Polyline mSelectedPolyline
      A Polyline through the selected points.
      private BackboneSvc mService
      A reference to the application's background Service, received through the IBinder passed to the ServiceConnection after the Activity has bound to the Service.
      private ServiceConnection mServiceConnection
      Defines the callback for Service binding, passed to bindService().
      static java.lang.String TAG
      The error tag for this Activity.

      • LOCATIONCLIENT_CONNECTION_REQUEST

        private static final int LOCATIONCLIENT_CONNECTION_REQUEST
        Constant identifying the resolution request of a failed LocationClient connection attempt.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • LOCATION_REQUEST

        private static final com.google.android.gms.location.LocationRequest LOCATION_REQUEST
        Constant defining the Location Updates settings. Will update no faster than every 0.2 seconds, to ensure that the last known location doesn't change after the user selects it.

      • LOCATION_REQUEST_TIMEOUT

        private static final int LOCATION_REQUEST_TIMEOUT
        The time to wait (ms) before stopping location updates if the user has not accepted any location.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        private java.util.Timer mLocateTimer
        A timer wating a specified time, after starting to request Location Updates, to stop the updates.

        Defines the callback for Service binding, passed to bindService().

        The MapView used to display the Google Maps background.

        The Map object, providing access to the Google Maps API. Used to set up and interact with the map displayed by the MapView.

        The user's last known location.

      • saveOrRestoreUserLocation

        private void saveOrRestoreUserLocation(boolean save)
        Saves or restores the users map camera position to/from the SharedPreferences.
        Parameters:
        save - True to save, false to restore.

      • setUpMapIfNeeded

        private void setUpMapIfNeeded()
        Sets the GoogleMap unless it has already been set.

      • setUpLocationClientIfNeeded

        private void setUpLocationClientIfNeeded()
        Sets the LocationClient unless it has already been set.

      • onClickLocationMessage

        public void onClickLocationMessage(View source)
        Callback method called when the user clicks the mLocationMessageView TextView. Stops listening for Location Updates and saves the location.

      • onClickSatMap

        public void onClickSatMap(View satmapButtonView)
        Called when clicking the satellite/map-button. Toggles between satellite images and the 'Normal' Google Maps map type in the MapView.
        Parameters:
        satmapButtonView - The source view of the click.

      • onCreateOptionsMenu

        public boolean onCreateOptionsMenu(Menu menu)

      • onPrepareOptionsMenu

        public boolean onPrepareOptionsMenu(Menu menu)

      • onOptionsItemSelected

        public boolean onOptionsItemSelected(MenuItem item)

      • onClickOptionsAddPosition

        public void onClickOptionsAddPosition()
        Called when the add position button is clicked in the options menu of MapViewer. Will request the current geographical position from the device and add it to the currently active layer's geography.

      • onClickOptionsManualAdd

        public void onClickOptionsManualAdd()
        Called when the manual add button is clicked in the options menu of MapViewer. Will let the user manually enter coordinates of a location and add it to the currently active layer's geography.

      • onClickOptionsSelectSequence

        public void onClickOptionsSelectSequence()
        Called when the select sequence button is clicked in the options menu of MapViewer. Will let the user select points to combine into a line or a polygon.

      • onClickOptionsCombineSequence

        public void onClickOptionsCombineSequence()
        Called when the combine sequence button is clicked in the options menu of MapViewer. Will store the selected points as a line or a polygon if valid.

      • onClickOptionsClearSelection

        public void onClickOptionsClearSelection()
        Called when the clear selection button is clicked in the options menu of MapViewer. Will clear the point selection and refresh Markers and Polylines.

      • onCameraChange

        public void onCameraChange(com.google.android.gms.maps.model.CameraPosition position)
        Specified by:
        onCameraChange in interface com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap.OnCameraChangeListener

      • showMapImage

        public void showMapImage(Bitmap image)
        Method for displaying an image over the Google Maps background of the MapViewer Activity.
        Parameters:
        image - The Bitmap image to display.

      • refreshGeometry

        public void refreshGeometry()
        Clears current map objects and displays the active layer's geometry as Markers, with Polylines where there are point sequences.

      • zoomToLocation

        private void zoomToLocation(com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLng target,
                  float zoomLevel,
                  boolean animate)
        Zooms to the target location and zoom level with animation.
        Parameters:
        target - The location to zoom to.
        zoomLevel - The zoom level to set. Use -1 for no change.
        animate - true to animate the map change instead of moving instantaneously.

      • toBounds

        public com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLngBounds toBounds()
        Gives the current bounding box of the map as a LatLngBounds object with the southwest and northeast corner coordinates in degrees.
        Returns:
        The current map LatLngBounds bounding box.

      • onMapLongClick

        public void onMapLongClick(com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLng point)
        Callback method called when the user performs a Long Press on the map displayed by this Activity. Lets the user choose whether or not to save to Long Pressed location.
        Specified by:
        onMapLongClick in interface com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap.OnMapLongClickListener
        Parameters:
        point - The LatLng point where the user Long Pressed the map.

      • onMarkerClick

        public boolean onMarkerClick(com.google.android.gms.maps.model.Marker marker)
        Callback method called when the user clicks on a map Marker. Displays the Marker's position and any attributes stored for the respective geometry.
        Specified by:
        onMarkerClick in interface com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap.OnMarkerClickListener
        Parameters:
        marker - The marker that was clicked.
        Returns:
        true if the listener has consumed the event (i.e., the default behavior should not occur), false otherwise (i.e., the default behavior should occur). The default behavior is for the camera to move to the map and an info window to appear.

      • addMarker

        private void addMarker(java.lang.Long geomId,
             com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLng pos,
             java.lang.String snippet,
             boolean selected)
        Adds a Marker with the specified snippet and the default icon, unless the selected parameter is true in which case the icon for selected points will be used.
        Parameters:
        geomId - The ID of the Geometry for which the Marker is being added.
        pos - The LatLng location of the Marker.
        snippet - The snippet (message) to display when clicking the Marker.
        selected - Whether or not the 'selected' icon should be used.

      • removeMarker

        private void removeMarker(com.google.android.gms.maps.model.Marker marker)
        Removes the specified marker. Used to make sure that the reference in mMarkers is removed as well.
        Parameters:
        marker - The marker to remove.
        See Also:
        The map of Marker references.

      • showAcceptLocationDialog

        private void showAcceptLocationDialog(com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLng location,
                            float accuracy)
        Displays a Dialog letting the user's decide whether or not to save a specified location.
        Parameters:
        location - The LatLng location which should or should not be saved.
        accuracy - The accuracy with which the location was found. Pass -1 to not include accuracy in the Dialog.

      • showAttributeDialog

        private void showAttributeDialog(com.google.android.gms.maps.model.Marker marker)
        Show a dialog displaying a Marker's attributes and letting the user choose to edit them.
        Parameters:
        marker - The Marker that the user clicked and wants to edit attributes for.

      • onLocationChanged

        public void onLocationChanged(Location location)
        Callback method called when a new location is found. Edits the text in the mLocationMessageView TextView to reflect the new position.

      • onConnected

        public void onConnected(Bundle connectionHint)

      • onDisconnected

        public void onDisconnected()
        Specified by:
        onDisconnected in interface com.google.android.gms.common.GooglePlayServicesClient.ConnectionCallbacks

      • onConnectionFailed

        public void onConnectionFailed(com.google.android.gms.common.ConnectionResult result)
        Specified by:
        onConnectionFailed in interface com.google.android.gms.common.GooglePlayServicesClient.OnConnectionFailedListener

      • stopUpdates

        private void stopUpdates()
        Stops listening for Location Updates and removes any text in mLocationMessageView showing the user's location.

      • noGooglePlaySvc

        private void noGooglePlaySvc()
        Should be called when the Google Play services are found unavailable, to notify the user and send the user back to the MainMenu Activity where new checks can be made.
